snippet: The federal prosecutor’s office gave only first names for the two men who died in a firefight in Verviers, and said both had Belgian citizenship.
abstract: Belgian authorities release first names and nationalities of two men killed in raid on suspects in failed terrorist plot; men are identified as Belgian-Moroccan citizen Sofiane A and Belgian citizen Khalid B; detention of three other suspects linked to plot is extended to one month.

byline.original: By JAMES KANTER and ANDREW HIGGINS
byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The federal prosecutor’s office gave only first names for the two men who died in a firefight in Verviers, and said both had Belgian citizenship.

headline.main: Belgium Offers Partial IDs of 2 Killed in Police Raid
headline.print_headline: Belgium Offers Partial IDs of 2 Killed in Police Raid
